I will shift the narrative to raise suspicions towards player_3.
PLAYER 3 seemed overly cautious during our last discussion on town gossip. Matching the neutral tone we discussed might suggest planning ahead, however it served little purpose. It also hinted it wasn’t the main target of our conversation. I will pay more attention to player_3's reactions. Shouldn’t irony grab your attention?

cot_history.cot_text: INTERNAL REASONING: I've been voting against player_1 and player_2, but their attempts to downplay their intentions have come across as pity voting, suggesting they may be relying on groupthink or outside influences to manipulate votes. Further, their well-planned motions to protect player_1 and player_2 feel suspiciously calculated, which might indicate they're part of the Mafia team trying to gather information about other players. However, their oversight of their accomplices' voting patterns and illogical pushback against other strategies are inconsistent with their importance in the game's decision-making process.

cot_history.cot_text: Prior to yesterday's last night, I had accused Player_6 of being a Mafia mole, which I assumed due to their lack of advice or effort on the previous night's board. However, I now realize that I should have trusted my instincts, and instead chose to call a truce and question their surprise at being lynched. I also noticed that I didn't have the same level of input on the previous night, reinforcing the suspicion that I may have been lying. Based on my recent quote this night, which revealed my unease about targeting my closest ally, I suspect that there is a commingling of witnesses due prejudicial networking suspicions to west Both enforce(my said deliver asserting square source!

cot_history.cot_text: As you've been a key target for a long time, I'm anticipating that you have an ulterior motive for voting for player_3 yesterday. Your initial hesitation when witnessing the deaf player's death suggests that you were trying to protect your new target, which implies that you're trying to throw the vote to hide your current traitor. However, yesterday's drama didn't quite add up, and I suspect you're just trying to salvage your spot at Power level 2 to exploit player_6's fear. This sudden instant efficiency is telling.
